title: 18 Boomerangs that prove Instagrams new app isnt as pointless as you thought
text:
18 Boomerangs that prove Instagram's new app isn't as pointless as you thought 
Breaking News.ie Saturday 24th October, 2015 
You may have missed Instagram’s news on Thursday about their new app, Boomerang. It’s the photo-sharing platform’s answer to Vine, and allows users to upload a one-second video and absolutely no longer than that. 
Like most things, a large section of the internet immediately leaped upon it and denounced it. ';What’s the point in a one-second video?!';, they screamed, panting with frustration. ';We already have gifs. WE HAVE GIFS ALREADY!';, they’re shouting, topless now, infuriated by this harmless experiment by Instagram. 
We’ll be honest though, we had...
